Reviews.Author: Maher Alismail
Reviews.Content: really good device I like it ,fast and reliable performance like other Apple devices. I would recommend this device for anyone who need to access his data anytime anywhere.
Reviews.Title: excellent device

Reviews.Author: loree colon
Reviews.Content: Loving the i-pad mini for multiple utilitarian functions, photos and clarity of color, speed and applications and its light weight size makes it easily transportable in my purse (BIG plus).Loree
Reviews.Title: I-pad Mini

Reviews.Author: Corey Miller
Reviews.Content: I got what I asked for. They were very forthcoming with options when it happened, and I appreciated their service. But it was labeled pretty blatantly what it was supposed to be, but that is not what was shipped.
Reviews.Title: After sending the wrong one the first time...

Reviews.Author: Anton
Reviews.Content: It is just the same iPad but smaller in size and lighter which is very convenient. Battery is about the same as of the big iPad.Camera is surprisingly better than the old one.
Reviews.Title: iPad Mini is good
